Reviews.Title: Great television...
Reviews.Author: Reagan "Reagan"
Reviews.Content: Couldn't be happier with this set. It is installed within my RV and works very well. Absolutely no issues and has a good picture quality. Good value for the money!

Reviews.Title: I recommend this TV to anyone that has very limited space to put it in.
Reviews.Author: Thomas C. Gebheim
Reviews.Content: It's Great! The TV/DVD really fits my needs in every way. I have very limited space to put it in and it fits just fine.

Reviews.Title: BETTER THAN EXPECTED
Reviews.Author: Martin J.
Reviews.Content: THE SOUND IS PRETTY GOOD, PICTURE IS CLEAR ,DVD WORKS FINE AND SETUP WAS EASY, USUALLY THE SOUND IS HORRIBLE IN SETS THIS SIZE, BUT I AM SATISFIDE

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: flygirl
Reviews.Content: 24" TV's with a built in DVD are not easy to find.  This unit is perfect for my RV.  The quality of the picture is much better than the 19" is replaced.

Reviews.Title: Great TV!
Reviews.Author: james m randall
Reviews.Content: We bought this for my wife's craft/quilting room. Perfect size, and great picture. Also, the easy to load DVD feature is a plus. I recommend this product!

Reviews.Title: Nice purchase
Reviews.Author: firsttimer
Reviews.Content: I purchased this for my mother. It's got a really clear picture and the sound is loud enough without speakers. I like it so much I'm thinking of getting one for me.

Reviews.Title: Do not buy this item.
Reviews.Author: shakur gibbs
Reviews.Content: DVD player does not work. Tried over a dozen disc, mostly all brand new, still didn't work. A couple disc played halfway thru than stopped. Terrible purchase.

Reviews.Title: exactly what I wanted
Reviews.Author: GAYLE STAFFORD
Reviews.Content: Boyfriend does not have atv, has not for years. He enjoys movies though. For Valentines Day, I wanted an easy tv with DVD component that would install in the corner of his " man cave".I could not be more happy with it.

Reviews.Title: Very disappointed.
Reviews.Author: Mr. J
Reviews.Content: Item was defective.  After approximately 20 days after use, the DVD player failed to consistently play.  Requested a return authorization to send unit back to seller.  Not too pleased.  Bought this unit for my sister who is confined to a bed in a nursing home........ This was her only source of entertainment........... Not too happy right now!

Reviews.Title: TV died in 1 year and 2 months
Reviews.Author: Rebeca E. Eigen
Reviews.Content: This TV is no longer functioning and only lasted one year and two months! I have NEVER had a TV go out that fast. VERY disappointing. I called them and they wanted $88. to repair it. I don't think a TV should go out that fast. Period.

Reviews.Title: Great DVD combo
Reviews.Author: Shelly
Reviews.Content: Setup was easy and the price was great.  Installed in my RV camper and immediately played a movie for my kids.  The DVD combo is great for campers.

Reviews.Title: Does the trick!
Reviews.Author: Kyle
Reviews.Content: Awesome TV....serves it's purpose well in my workout room! Sound is good, picture is great.  No complaints about this TV at all!

Reviews.Title: Need help setting this  tv up.
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: We are having trouble getting a picture or sound on this tv. We have an antenna hooked up but have no reception. Can anyone help?

Reviews.Title: Nice combo tv !
Reviews.Author: linnemeyerhere
Reviews.Content: Sound is not this tv's strength, it's not distorted just all mids and highs. Screen is good but with my non-HD cable box I can't find the setting to get the proper resolution. I'm watching my first dvd now and performance is very good, finally the resolution issue is gone and clarity is sharp, this what I hoped from Time Warner POS non-def. box but I guess that's just too much to ask for $165.00 a month. Charter and TW can go F-off in my book !

Reviews.Title: TechNGet charges 20% of cost of item to restocking fee when item is returned!!
Reviews.Author: shauna sindo
Reviews.Content: While I will, in the future, read all the fine print, I was appalled that the TECHNGET company would charge 20% of the cost of the tv/dvd for restocking fee when returned.  This tv/dvd combo was too small for the intended space in my home.. Amazon representative was very helpful(GO AMazon) TechNGet had no response to the two letters of compliant that I wrote.. Caring company TechNGet.. Won't B doing biz with them again..

Reviews.Title: HDTV with regular DVD Player makes no sense
Reviews.Author: jason dotson
Reviews.Content: Why have a hdtv and then stick a regular dvd player in it ? Wouldnt a Bluray player make more sense in a hdtv ?

ProductInfo.Features:
Resolution 720p
Built-in DVD Player
Slim Design with LED backlight
HDMI Inputs: 1
ProductInfo.Name: JVC LT-24DE73 24" 720p LED HDTV and DVD Player Combo TV
